verses.verse: Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, (for he was the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>; but, forasmuch as he <S%H2490>defiled<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H3326>bed<s%>, his <S%H1062>birthright<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and the genealogy is not to be <S%H3187>reckoned<s%> after the <S%H1062>birthright<s%>.
For <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> above his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and of him came the chief <S%H5057>ruler<s%>; but the <S%H1062>birthright<s%> was <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%>:)
The <S%H1121>sons<s%>, I say, of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were, <S%H2585>Hanoch<s%>, and <S%H6396>Pallu<s%>, <S%H2696>Hezron<s%>, and <S%H3756>Carmi<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel<s%>; <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H1463>Gog<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,
<S%H4318>Micah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H7211>Reaia<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H1168>Baal<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,

<S%H880>Beerah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, whom <S%H8407>Tilgath-pilneser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> carried <S%H1540>away<s%> captive: he was <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>.

And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>, when the <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> of their <S%H8435>generations<s%> was <S%H3187>reckoned<s%>, were the <S%H7218>chief<s%>, <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%>, and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>,

And <S%H1106>Bela<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5811>Azaz<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8087>Shema<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, even unto <S%H5015>Nebo<s%> and <S%H1186>Baal-meon<s%>:

And <S%H4217>eastward<s%> he <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> unto the <S%H935>entering<s%> in of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> from the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>: because their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> were <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

And in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with the <S%H1905>Hagarites<s%>, who <S%H5307>fell<s%> by their <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their <S%H168>tents<s%> <S%H6440>throughout<s%> all the <S%H4217>east<s%> land of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.
¶ And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> over against them, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> unto <S%H5548>Salchah<s%>:
<S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%>, and <S%H8223>Shapham<s%> the <S%H4932>next<s%>, and <S%H3285>Jaanai<s%>, and <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

And their <S%H251>brethren<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> were, <S%H4317>Michael<s%>, and <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, and <S%H7652>Sheba<s%>, and <S%H3140>Jorai<s%>, and <S%H3275>Jachan<s%>, and <S%H2127>Zia<s%>, and <S%H5677>Heber<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%>.

These are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H32>Abihail<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2359>Huri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3386>Jaroah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3454>Jeshishai<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3163>Jahdo<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H938>Buz<s%>;
<S%H277>Ahi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5661>Abdiel<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1476>Guni<s%>, <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.
And they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, and in her <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and in all the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of <S%H8289>Sharon<s%>, upon their <S%H8444>borders<s%>.

All these were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogies<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

¶ The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, of valiant <S%H2428>men<s%>, <S%H582>men<s%> able to <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H4043>buckler<s%> and <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and to <S%H1869>shoot<s%> with <S%H7198>bow<s%>, and <S%H3925>skilful<s%> in <S%H4421>war<s%>, were <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>threescore<s%>, that went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H6635>war<s%>.
And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with the <S%H1905>Hagarites<s%>, with <S%H3195>Jetur<s%>, and <S%H5305>Nephish<s%>, and <S%H5114>Nodab<s%>.

And they were <S%H5826>helped<s%> against them, and the <S%H1905>Hagarites<s%> were <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and all that were with them: for they <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and he was <S%H6279>intreated<s%> of them; because they put their <S%H982>trust<s%> in him.

And they took <S%H7617>away<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle<s%>; of their <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and of <S%H6629>sheep<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and of <S%H2543>asses<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and of <S%H120%H5315>men<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

For there <S%H5307>fell<s%> down <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%>, because the <S%H4421>war<s%> was of <S%H430>God<s%>. And they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their steads until the <S%H1473>captivity<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>: they <S%H7235>increased<s%> from <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> unto <S%H1179>Baal-hermon<s%> and <S%H8149>Senir<s%>, and unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>.

And these were the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, even <S%H6081>Epher<s%>, and <S%H3469>Ishi<s%>, and <S%H447>Eliel<s%>, and <S%H5837>Azriel<s%>, and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, and <S%H1938>Hodaviah<s%>, and <S%H3164>Jahdiel<s%>, <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valour<s%>, <S%H8034>famous<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

¶ And they <S%H4603>transgressed<s%> against the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and went a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, whom <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

And the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H6322>Pul<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H8407>Tilgath-pilneser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and he carried them <S%H1540>away<s%>, even the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them unto <S%H2477>Halah<s%>, and <S%H2249>Habor<s%>, and <S%H2024>Hara<s%>, and to the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H1470>Gozan<s%>, unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
